settings.hero_title: OWS Pro: Hear the World, Feel the Music.
settings.hero_subtext: The ultimate open-ear headphones for all-day comfort, situational awareness, and powerful bass.
settings.features_subtext: Discover the core innovations that make OWS Pro the perfect audio companion.
settings.reviews_heading: Loved by runners, creators, and audiophiles.
settings.reviews_subtext: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what the community is saying.
settings.compare_heading: Which Oladance is Right for You?
settings.compare_subtext: See how the OWS Pro stacks up against our classic OWS 2.

settings.title: Stable enough to stay put, comfortable enough to forget.
settings.text: Our patented open ear design and integrated liquid silicone molding mean the OWS Pro rests gently on top of your ear, never intruding. Comfort all day, every day.

settings.title: Stay connected to your world, without sacrificing your soundtrack.
settings.text: With our patented open ear design, the OWS Pro keeps you in sync with your surroundings, without sealing the ear canal.

settings.title: Feel the beat. Our second-gen bass algorithm delivers a powerful surge of sound.
settings.text: Our patented Virtual Bass 2nd algorithm uses high dynamic power to enhance low-frequency sound quality, significantly improving bass volume for a fuller, deeper bass.

settings.title: Up to 58 hours of power. Your marathon playlist has met its match.
settings.text: Our self-developed 150mAh "Little Steel Cannon" battery offers high density, small volume, stronger charge storage, and higher safety.

settings.quote: The most comfortable headphones I've ever worn for a run. I completely forget they're there, but the sound is incredible.
settings.author: Alex Johnson

settings.quote: As a cyclist, being able to hear traffic is non-negotiable. OWS Pro lets me enjoy my podcasts without tuning out the world. Game-changer.
settings.author: Samantha Lee

settings.quote: The bass response on these is surprisingly powerful for an open-ear design. My go-to for both conference calls and commuting.
settings.author: Michael Chen

settings.question: What is the warranty policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 12-month limited warranty on all Oladance products. This covers any manufacturing defects. For more details, please visit our official warranty page.

settings.question: Are they suitable for running in the rain?
settings.answer: Yes, the OWS Pro has an IPX4 waterproof rating, which means they are resistant to water splashes from any direction. They are perfect for workouts in the rain or intense, sweaty sessions.

settings.question: How do I pair them with my device?
settings.answer: Simply open the charging case, and the OWS Pro will automatically enter pairing mode. Go to the Bluetooth settings on your device, select "Oladance OWS Pro," and you're connected.
